name: Can Purchase Oil
descriptionHtml:
GIVEN Current Electricity stock is greater than 0

AND I submit a valid purchase order

THEN a new order shall be recorded

AND the order shall contain the correct purchase order information

AND I should receive a message advising me of the particulars of my purchase
statusMessage:
Multiple failures or warnings in test:
  1)   Assert.That(splitResponseMessage[9], Is.EqualTo((Global.DefaultStockLevels.Oil.UnitCost * unitsToBuy).ToString()))
  String lengths are both 3. Strings differ at index 0.
  Expected: "5.0"
  But was:  "6.0"
  -----------^

  2)   Assert.That(buyResponse.Content.Message, Is.EqualTo($"You have purchased {unitsToBuy} {Global.DefaultStockLevels.Oil.UnitMeasurement} at a cost of {Global.DefaultStockLevels.Oil.UnitCost * unitsToBuy} there are {Global.DefaultStockLevels.Oil.UnitsInStock - unitsToBuy} units remaining. Your order id is {order.Id}."))
  Expected string length 130 but was 129. Strings differ at index 42.
  Expected: "You have purchased 10 Litres at a cost of 5.0 there are 10 un..."
  But was:  "You have purchased 10 Litres at a cost of 6.0 there are 10 un..."
  -----------------------------------------------------^
